name: clawbridge-runner
description: CLI runner for clawbridge-skill-latest skill - executes nightly and delivers Connection Briefs

scripts.release: git add -A && (git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release updates") && git push && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: git add -A && (git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release updates") && git push && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: git add -A && (git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "chore: pre-release updates") && git push && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
